did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: "Analysis of the Agreement Between K.R. Wilson and Local #564 of the International Union, UAW", 1948-1948
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: "Analysis of the Agreement Between K.R. Wilson and Local #564 of the International Union, UAW," by Nelson M. Ripley.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "Analysis of the Agreement Between K.R. Wilson and Local #564 of the International Union, UAW," a term paper by Nelson M. Ripley for Professor Jean McKelvey for a course on Contract Making and Administration, Fall 1948.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: International Union, United Automobile, Aircraft, and Agricultural Implement Workers of America. Local 564

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
